https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qpIeEHO5CY5WUgRtYjjI5PRINNX.jpg A pitcher of a major-league baseball team finds out that his teammate and pal is desperately trying to hide that he is dying of a terminal disease so the owner won't find out and fire him. Bang the Drum Slowly
